author: Ihsan Husse
comment: The only two things that I wish you to fix in this face are 1) Week  day. 2) The light reflection of the skin is too bright so that when I use darker background color its contrast becomes not suitable. One extra advantage would be better if we can choose the lable color of the skin to be able to match the background and text colors. Best Regards and Good Luck

author: Kempton Wakfield
comment: After purchasing watch face, it gives a message stating watch face will be available on your watch in a moment. It's been a month and I still waiting for that moment to come.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi, it looks amazing on your watch and we are happy to help.  Email us at forzaonestudios@gmail.com.  Thanks!

author: Brian fix
comment: I want my money back you can't change the watch faces please give me my money back

author: Reppy 07
comment: (Huawei here) *PLEASE* add a true black theme for me. Please. I use two third party apps called "SWApp True Dark" and "Wear Edge Control" to get the darkest settings because I use my watch mostly at night.. I would like to see the date format with the weekday as well. And it would be a LOT better if the moon phase/timezone area if it were optional or a way to open a specific app. You guys almost have the perfect one for me. It's my birthday today, make that my bday gift lol

author: Chris Jones
comment: I love this watch face. Very clear and easy to read, great features and color combos, OUTSTANDING SUPPORT WITH QUICK TURN AROUND, IMO these guys make the best watch faces availabe

author: Matt Bonneville
comment: Been playing around with it for a bit and it seems to work really well.  Not too expensive,  definitely worth the purchase.
title: Great watch face

author: Mike Forslund
comment: Great customer service and support. I will continue to purchase. Highly recommended.
title: Amazing

author: Chris Barrett
comment: Looks great and works well on the lg smart watch urbane.

author: Saravanan. G.M
comment: Beautiful Wear, worth the purchase. Go for it

author: Ian toole
comment: I love the w04 but this is a great digital alternative. Great options for colours and not as busy as the w05. I will be using this for a while. Slight issue with temperature now it's in the minus.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for the detailed review Ian.  We appreciate it.

title: W03 - Very Nice

author: Donald Lewis
comment: This new watch face is remarkable in its design! Beautiful crisp clean design, quick and easy to find pertinent information without having to hunt for it, and just a really cool sleek customizable display that begs you to keep looking at it.  Forza one does it again!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for the great review Donald!

title: Beautiful!

author: Brandon Cote
comment: Great looking watch face. Not too cluttered, and just the right amount of information to see. Really love the solid notification option when the watch is idle! I would recommend this face or any face from this company for anyone who has a smart watch!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for the great recommendation Brandon!

title: Great simple design

author: Dave Lufkin
comment: I like this one best of all the Forza faces yet. Not too cluttered, easy to change options, and looks really great on my ZenWatch 2. Keep up the great work!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review Dave.

title: Best yet

author: Martin Santucho
comment: I've been looking for a complete watchface,  with clear information,  easy to read.  This one is one of the best
title: Best on market

author: Paul Gold
comment: Nice looking face. Like the different skins.
title: Clean design

author: Dave Rush
comment: Great watch to add to my collection
